content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 1, Basel 2.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 1, Basel 2.
Attempt saved. Samuel Eto'o (Chelsea) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Attempt saved. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ashley Cole.
Substitution, Basel. Taulant Xhaka replaces Mohamed Salah.
Hand ball by Mohamed Salah (Basel).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Fabian Schär (Basel) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Marcelo Díaz (Basel) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Matías Delgado.
Substitution, Basel. Arlind Ajeti replaces Valentin Stocker.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Basel 2. Marco Streller (Basel) header from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Matías Delgado with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Basel. Conceded by David Luiz.
Attempt blocked. Marco Streller (Basel) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mohamed Salah.
